entry.title: March 11, 2020 meetup
entry.content:
• Modernizing PowerShell Scripts by Matthias van den Elsacker
  • Git(Hub) 101 by Stijn & Merlijn

Introducing peer to peer learning sessions open to all new PowerShell enthousiasts. Bring your laptop and show us the PowerShell challenge you’re struggling with. We’ll do our best to help you understand the concepts and guide you through some best practices of coding in PowerShell. After all, that’s what a user group is about :)

Hosted at ob-V-us (Diegem) Register here!
entry.summary: Modernizing PowerShell Scripts by Matthias van den Elsacker Git(Hub) 101 by Stijn & Merlijn

entry.title: September 27, 2018 meetup
entry.content:
• Infrastructure-as-Code: VSTS, Azure and the glue of PowerShell by Jeff Wouters
  • Azure Cloud Shell and SHiPS by Steven Taylor
  • Stick to the full potential of PowerShell by Christof Van Geendertaelen
  • Function ctrl-c {} by Merlijn Van Waeyenberghe
  • Too late for a complex ARM template by Ivo Haagen

Hosted at Xylos Register here! Github slides and demo
